english.segment1: To the faithless You are faithful. To the broken You are able. To the captives You are liberty. To the orphan You are Father. To the widow You are a lover. To the blind You are eyes to see
english.segment2: Chorus. God of grace. You took our place. You love us where we are, all the weak and broken sing, we love You God of grace
english.segment3: To the homeless You are shelter. To the thirsty living water. To the lame You give them feet to dance
english.segment4: To the helpless You are a brother. To the hungry You are bread. and to all sinners You are second chance
english.segment5: Bridge. Merciful in all Your ways. How could we cease to sing Your praise. You became sin for us. Oh how precious is Your love
english.segment6: And now redeemed Your children sing we love You God of Grace. Bells will ring Your bride will sing we love You God of Grace
